methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.description: This application uses Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) combined with Claude AI to predict voting behavior.

steps.1: Historical voting data and speeches are collected from the Riigikogu API
steps.2: Text is converted to vector embeddings for semantic search
steps.3: When a new bill is submitted, similar past votes and speeches are retrieved
steps.4: Claude AI analyzes the context and makes a prediction with reasoning
